name: Debt Dungeon
description:
You've been sent to the dungeon for your immense amount of debt! Shoot your way to the end overcoming different types enemies to survive!

Team Members & Primary Roles

Yash Babaria: Programmer/ Enemy and AI

Trent Becklow: Designer/Animations and Prefab

Browdrie Coonfer: Designer/UI

Dominic Gomez: Programmer/Player Mechanics

Joseph Teixeira: Designer/ Level Design

Controls

WASD: Movement

Shooting: Left click

Reload: R

Aiming: Mouse

Swap Weapons: Scroll Wheel/Num Keys 1, 2, 3, 4
